channel.title: [317]Bronze Age Development
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape, this is my Official Development thread for the server Bronze Age.
[b]Introduction[/b]: [i]This is the development of a server called Bronze Age. I have just joined the RSPS Community all together. So please don't expect much from me when I release the source. I do plan on taking my time though at least, and I do plan on keeping this updated.[/i]
[b]Base[/b]: [i]Delta-Cleaned [/i] Credits to [b]Johnny J[/b]
[center][b]Server Features[/b][/center]
[b]Version 1.0 Features[/b] [code] 10/11/10 * Lag-Walking Fixed * Magic almost perfected * Source Cleanup (Conventions, Useless Spaces etc) * Starter added (500k Coins, 500 Runes Mind-Fire) * Woodcutting almost great (Tree Spirit added) * Fishing has been improved (Face towards spot, Accurate Fishing etc) * Shops have been added (A lot) * Doors fixed (Varrock, Falador, and Lumbridge) * Common bug for Women fixed (Couldn't attack) * Common Quest for Starters * Start of Fletching, and Firemaking * Magic tweaks (Freeze, you can now bind/Snare/Entangle/Ice Freeze any NPC) * Common Name Fixes (Fishing Items, and Spots) * Requirement against Slayer (Level 30 to being Slayer)
10/12/10 * Firemaking, Fishing, and Fletching skill has been complete. (I don't know about 100%) * Source cleaned more (Useless Dead Codes, Methods etc) [/code]
[b]Version 2.0 Features[/b] [code]10/15/10 * EXP changed to 750 for fair amount of EXP. * TextHandler.Java has been cleaned.
10-16-10 * Added almost perfect Dharok Formula and Obby Neck * Re-done Cooking method * Re-done CalculateMaxHit method * Fixed GFX Projectile (Magic) * Fixed a Autospawn.cfg lag * Range Following Added (Some things need to be tweaked)
10-18-2010 * A lot of useless codes removed from Client.Java, and Potions.Java * Some timers have been fixed (Not perfect though, I tried) [/code] I will update the Thread as promised when another update comes to the server.
Also, I can see that people do not like Deltascape base. Though people need to give it a chance and take the time to actually modify it and stuff. I did look at the coding and it's not the best though it's something that be can perfected into something good also. Plus this is my first server, and I might as well start from somewhere.
[center][b][size=12pt]Media:[/size][/b][/center] When first logging in, and Starter Equipment [b](Changed)[/b]: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Starting-1.jpg[/img]
Doors have been fixed [b](Varrock, Falador, and Lumbridge)[/b]: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture3-2-1.jpg[/img]
The good old Runescape Grameframe: [IMG]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll12/demonking7982/Picture5-1.jpg[/img]
Like I said; "I know there isn't a lot." Though just have patient with me as I'm learning as I go with this development progress. I will move on to another base after I release this one as well.
[b]I'm going to be working on this on my own. I don't trust anyone at the moment; though in time their might be someone who I can trust. I have been back stabbed already and only been with RSPS for six days. That just goes to show how some people are very low in this world. Plus the fact they must not be able to do better than me assuming I've only been coding six days; and he took a lot of my work.[/b]
[b]The outcome regarding Skillcapes has been made in which I'm not going to be adding the emotes to the Skillcapes at the moment! I am not that much familiar with the Client part of programming; therefore it will have to wait unless someone wants to help me and not back stab me in the end.[/b]
Thank You for Reading,
Ix Soulcist xI (James)

I’m having some problems with adding them because the client is being so stubborn. I am unpleased to state that this feature might have to hold off for a while. Though I’ll work on the flaw that is causing this feature to not be added; I’m going to be embarrassed when someone else has added it before me, if not already that is.

-ahem- I won.
[/quote]

And mine was better…I win still.

item.title: [317]Bronze Age Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I don’t know how I’m going to name the versions once I release them. For now I’ve put 1.0 then go to 1.5 and then go to 2.0 for now. I’ve also separated the server features by versions.

Thanks for the comments though.

I have to be honest though; I’m ready to get out of this project. I’ve realized just how much this source is horrible, and therefore I’m ready to get out of this project. However, I’m not going to break what I’ve said and going to continue to work on the project as said. When I do get out of this project, I’m going to start to work on Project-Insanity.

Also a update on the Skillcapes:

I’m having some problems with adding them because the client is being so stubborn. I am unpleased to state that this feature might have to hold off for a while. Though I’ll work on the flaw that is causing this feature to not be added; I’m going to be embarrassed when someone else has added it before me, if not already that is.

Read full topic

Rocky2k10:

i was gonna say can i develop with you but when i read that you dont trust others i just thought its not fair for you that u got backstabbed

The saddest part about it is they’ve been registered longer than me (not giving names); and decide that I was better than them or something and steals my work after release.

The only way I would trust someone to work with me is if I get to know them. You never know I might end up accepting your offer.

item.title: [317]Bronze Age Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Server updates have been updated.

Firemaking, Fishing, and Fletching skill has been completed. I don’t know about it being 100%, their might be some bugs. I’ll fix them when I find them though.

I’ll add media of it as well soon.

ipods:

nice job,if u want me to start a project with me that’ll be great =)

That would be something great mate. I’ll think about it when I’m done releasing version for this server. At the moment like I said in the Thread. I might pick up some people along the way to help me out if they wanted. At the moment, I have a friend that is helping me with the basics of the server. (E.G. Shop Items, Npcdrops, etc)

Read full topic
